row.scheme: ;;;;;; RHFinger (let ((tag "RHFinger") (num "0")) (set! num (d-GetKeypress)) (if (string->number num) (begin (d-DirectivePut-note-display tag num) (d-DirectivePut-note-postfix tag (string-append "-\\rightHandFinger #" num " ")) (d-DirectivePut-note-minpixels tag 20) (d-DirectivePut-note-tx tag 10) (d-Chordize #t)) (begin (d-DirectiveDelete-note tag))) (d-SetSaved #f) (d-RefreshDisplay))
row._tooltip: Follow with a number keypress, the note at the cursor is typeset with the given number as right hand fingering. Use a non-number to delete.
